Origins: On 22 April 2009, four-year-old Preston Loyd of Mooresville, North Carolina, suffered extensive injuries when he was accidentally run over by a lawn mower operated by his grandfather. As described in the Mooresville Tribune , Preston was immediately airlifted to a hospital for medical treatment, including surgery which involved the removal of his spleen and one kidney:
Description: According to the accounts from his mother on the CaringBridge site established for Preston, as of 24 May 2009 he was moved out of intensive care and has been talking, singing, and breathing on his own.
Example: [Collected via e-mail, May 2009] Prayer Request Preston Lloyd - 4 years old was ran over by a lawn mower yesterday afternoon and is in critical condition at CAMC children's hospital in Charleston, WV. I was asked to send everyone an email and ask for prayer. They have done some patch surgery just enough to try and stabilize him until they decide what to do next. His stomach is ripped out, he has lost his spleen and 1 kidney and his arm is crushed. Please help us start a prayer chain.
Claim: Prayers are requested for Preston Loyd, a 4-year-old boy who was run over by a lawn mower.
